item.title: Possible Downtime this weekend
item.description: Tropical Storm Hanna is expected to reach the New Jersey area on Saturday, September 6, 2008. The latest predictions as of 20:00 September 4th call for winds from 30-60 MPH and rainfall possibly in excess of 5 inches, at a rate of 1-1.5 inches per hour (as …
item.dc:creator: admin
